com.roobo.vui.common.pipe

Class CustomBufferingPipe<AudioChunkType extends com.nuance.dragon.toolkit.audio.AbstractAudioChunk>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nuance.dragon.toolkit.audio.AudioSource<OutputType>
      • com.nuance.dragon.toolkit.audio.AudioPipe<InputType,OutputType>
        • com.nuance.dragon.toolkit.audio.pipes.SingleSinkPipe<AudioChunkType,AudioChunkType>
          • com.roobo.vui.common.pipe.CustomBufferingPipe<AudioChunkType>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VADBufferPipe

    public class CustomBufferingPipe<AudioChunkType extends com.nuance.dragon.toolkit.audio.AbstractAudioChunk>
extends com.nuance.dragon.toolkit.audio.pipes.SingleSinkPipe<AudioChunkType,AudioChunkType>
    A basic audio pipe that consumes audio as fast as possible from its source, and buffers it here.

    Created by ping_guo on 2017/6/1.

        expectedAudioType - The expected audio type of the chunks for this pipe.

      • CustomBufferingPipe

        public CustomBufferingPipe(com.nuance.dragon.toolkit.audio.AudioType expectedAudioType,
                           int maxDuration)
        BufferingPipe constructor
        Parameters:
        expectedAudioType - The expected audio type of the chunks for this pipe.
        maxDuration - The duration (in ms.) after when non consumed audio is considered too old and cleared, or -1 to never clear the pipe. Default is -1.
